title: Wtf is up with this **** low priority queue
body:
Been good ever since i got my last low priority queue for like 3 weeks which was 10 mins and my net dc's during load screen and can't connect to login for first 5 minutes and i f**king get a low priority queue again? yay for 5 games with 20 minute waste. 

ps. fk u riot, bring back the bans please instead of this garbage low priority queue for innocent people

replies.body: Riots working on the tribunal at the moment however perhaps you should use your time in low priority to think how to use internet  etiquette c:

SAME !! :( i dc from a match and it says i left or went AFK then i was place in low prority matches then when it was over i dc'd again and was put in another but this time it was 20 FRIKKEN MINUTES. PMO
Or maybe stop playing till u fix it gg

this ^.
Essentially the low priority ques have been put in place to ensure that people don't afk and if they are continuously dcing, to get their internet/pc fixed. If you don't want to be placed in low priority ques, sort your ❤❤❤❤ out.

Priorty que is complete bullshit i quit league cause if riot dosent stop im just gonna leave YOU ARENT HELPING ANYBODY WITH 30MIN PRIORTY QUE HOLY SHIT I COULD PLAY 1 GAME IN THE TIME U MAKE ME WAIT if it was 5min it would be ok but SERIOUSLY 30MIN ARE YOU KIDDING ME

yeah %%%% you, how am i supposed to know when my games crashes? it was for 2 minutes when my net was down and i have been punished with 2 hours of waiting... and the previous one was when i had to take a %%%% when my whole team was snowballed even and it didnt even kick me out, came back when the warning just popped up so don't say %%%% before you know what happened.
